description: Scale a PNM file quickly with possibly reduced quality. See also: pamscale. More information: https://netpbm.sourceforge.net/doc/pnmscalefixed.html.

useCases.description: Scale an image such that the result has the specified dimensions:
Scale an image such that the result has the specified width, keeping the aspect ratio:
Scale an image such that its width and height is changed by the specified factors:
